generalContent.introCopy: Welcome to Code Workshop! Yes, indeed.

projects.projectDescription: Partner portal for existing EE, T-mobile and Orange resellers to access branding and marketing information.

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Sapient is a consulting and technology company with a global headcount of over 7k.
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: I was part of a two-man front end team developing a portal site for internal partners. Due to a short deadline, the pages were developed from wireframes and styleguides with full GD for only some of the elements, this was sucessfully accomplished by an ongoing consultation and review process with designers and IA's.
otherDetails: Login form scripting for clientside validation and querying REST login service
Front end support for Jahia CMS developers

projects.projectDescription: Hair Fashion inspiration from Toni&Guy. Recreate this season's catwalk & street-style looks with 4 style collections
projects.shortDescription: Part of a three man 'Phase 2' FE team extending and bug fixing existing code.

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Sapient is a consulting and technology company with a global headcount of over 7k.
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: UI development, additional and extended product templates/functionality, implementation/specification of Google hashbang (#!) url mapping to SEO content, url manipulation for additional locales.
otherDetails: Work with nationally and internationally distributed teams
Scripting work with existing internal libraries

projects.shortDescription: HTML5 build of competition site, including video assets of races and work with .net developer.

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Iris are one of the world's leading independent integrated agency groups.
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: Build of 'Sure Men Fast Cash Races' which allowed consumers to enter a pack code and then watch a series of 'Top Gear' style drag races with the possibility of winning £10!

projects.projectDescription: 'Business As Usual' ongoing work for Vodafone
projects.shortDescription: HTML/CSS/JS implementation and maintenance work on the Vodafone uk site, including ongoing BAU work and new microsites.

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Sapient is a consulting and technology company with a global headcount of over 7k.
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: I was brought in as part of a team to help improve the existing codebase and to implement new projects, including a microsite for the launch of the iPhone 4 on the Vodafone network.
otherDetails: Work with nationally and internationally distributed teams
Scripting work with existing internal libraries

projects.shortDescription: HTML/CSS/JS implementation work on Morrison's including a 'wine Chooser' module and 'Offers' pages.

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Candi International was a small independant agency.
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: I was brought in as part of a team to implement new projects, including working alongside .net devs.

projects.projectDescription: Full front end of Telenor website
projects.shortDescription: HTML/CSS/JS build of templates for the Telenor website.

extendedInfo.agencyDetails: Tonic was a small independant agency.
extendedInfo.workUndertaken: Built the original front end. Client decided to change the background from white to black at the very last minute which was relatively easy with my well structured css.
